languages.text: "Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус никогда не будет говорить со сбродом вроде ксеносов как с равными. Так что выражай должное почтение, если хочешь жить".
"Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус никогда не будет говорить со сбродом вроде ксеносов как с равными. Так что выражай должное почтение, если хочешь жить".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."
"Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."
"Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."
"Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."

languages.text: “冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人绝不会以平等的态度来对待异形这种败类。所以，如果你想活命的话，就要以合适的尊重态度来称呼我。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."

traits.locale_text: “冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人绝不会以平等的态度来对待异形这种败类。所以，如果你想活命的话，就要以合适的尊重态度来称呼我。”

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius nunca hablará con escoria como los xenos como si fueran iguales. De modo que, si quieres vivir, te dirigirás a mí con el debido respeto».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius nunca hablará con escoria como los xenos como si fueran iguales. De modo que, si quieres vivir, te dirigirás a mí con el debido respeto».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが異種族のような害虫と対等の立場として話すことなどあり得ない。命が惜しければ、相応の敬意を込めて接するがいい」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが異種族のような害虫と対等の立場として話すことなどあり得ない。命が惜しければ、相応の敬意を込めて接するがいい」

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} von Valancius wird Ungeziefer wie Xenos niemals als gleichberechtigt behandeln. Wenn Ihr leben wollt, werdet Ihr mich mit dem gebotenen Respekt ansprechen."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} von Valancius wird Ungeziefer wie Xenos niemals als gleichberechtigt behandeln. Wenn Ihr leben wollt, werdet Ihr mich mit dem gebotenen Respekt ansprechen."

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} von Valancius ne s'abaissera jamais à parler aux xénos d'égal à égal. Si vous tenez à la vie, vous vous adresserez à moi avec le respect qui m'est dû. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} von Valancius ne s'abaissera jamais à parler aux xénos d'égal à égal. Si vous tenez à la vie, vous vous adresserez à moi avec le respect qui m'est dû. »

languages.text: "Hür Tacir von Valancius, asla zeno haşereleriyle eşitmiş gibi konuşmaz. Yaşamak istiyorsan bana saygılı bir şekilde hitap edeceksin."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader von Valancius will never speak to vermin such as xenos as if they were equals. So, if you want to live, you will address me with the proper respect."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir von Valancius, asla zeno haşereleriyle eşitmiş gibi konuşmaz. Yaşamak istiyorsan bana saygılı bir şekilde hitap edeceksin."
